entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump He wouldn't answer her question--Here is what he did in Feb: "President Donald Trump suggested that the new coronavirus would go away in April, as temperatures warm." "The coronavirus is under control in the USA." One day it's like a miracle, it will disappear." etc, etc, etc!
